name: CSI: Miami
description:
CRIME ALWAYS HAS A PRICE.
SOMEBODY'S GOT TO PLAY.
CSI:Miami, the latest CSI crime-solving game, will lead you down slippery trails of evidence into the steamy world of Miami's beaches and nightclubs. Join the CSI: Miami cast and use their high-tech crime lab to find the truth and dissect the criminal mind.

WORK ALONGSIDE THE WHOLE TV CAST

    Join the entire cast of CSI: MIAMI, featuring the actual voices of Lieutenant Horatio Caine, Caleigh Duquesne, Eric Delko, Tim Speedle, Medical Examiner Alexx Woods, Detective Yelina Salas and Lab Tech Valera.



EXPLORE MIAMI'S CRIME SCENES

    From a staged death in a nightclub to a woman found strangled on a yacht, CSI: Miami story-writer Max Allan Collins takes you through a tangled progression of crime scenes, all culminating in a surprising conclusion.
